item.title: Apple Headset Stalls, Struggles to Attract Killer Apps in First Year
item.description: Many of the most successful virtual-reality software developers haven’t built apps for the Vision Pro headset, leading some users to opt out.

item.title: This AI Pioneer Thinks AI Is Dumber Than a Cat
item.description: Yann LeCun, an NYU professor and senior researcher at Meta Platforms, says warnings about the technology’s existential peril are ‘complete B.S.’

item.description: The Democratic nominee isn’t campaigning much on the Biden administration’s bigger, slower-moving policies.
